com.aionemu.gameserver.controllers
Class CreatureController<T extends Creature>

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.controllers.VisibleObjectController<Creature>
      com.aionemu.gameserver.controllers.CreatureController<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
NpcController, PlayerController, SummonController
public abstract class CreatureController<T extends Creature>
extends VisibleObjectController<Creature>

This class is for controlling Creatures [npc's, players etc]

Author:
-Nemesiss-, ATracer(2009-09-29), Sarynth
